Preparatory expenditure
	The persons listed in subsection (2) may incur expenditure for the purposeof or in connection with preparing for the imposition of a tax on the increasein the value of land resulting from the grant of permission for development.
	Those persons are—
		the Commissioners for Her Majesty’s Revenue and Customs,
		the Secretary of State, and
		a Northern Ireland Department.
	Expenditure by virtue of subsection (2)(a) or (b) shall be paid out ofmoney provided by Parliament.
Extent 
	This Act extends to the United Kingdom.
Short Title
	This Act may be cited as the Planning-gain Supplement (Preparations) Act 2007.
